2023-08-19 14:02:01.835 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (25ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 14:33:18.559 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (13ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 14:34:22.223 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-19 14:42:51.054 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

WHERE a."NormalizedEmail" = @__normalizedEmail_0
LIMIT 2

2023-08-19 15:07:41.485 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (11ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 15:51:25.863 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (23ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-19 15:52:09.930 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 15:54:54.639 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 15:54:56.987 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 15:59:11.364 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-19 15:59:25.130 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 16:02:22.531 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 16:15:44.122 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT

2023-08-19 16:16:18.588 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 16:21:50.073 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 16:34:46.894 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (13ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT

2023-08-19 16:38:01.306 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (8ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 16:38:27.849 +04:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2023-08-19 16:38:27.964 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 17:01:29.181 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (62ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."OrderCode", (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName", CASE
    WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
END AS "Completed"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON t."Id" = c."OrderId"
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-19 17:01:57.843 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (17ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-19 17:02:16.325 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (29ms) [Parameters=[@__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

) AS t

    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0

) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."BasketId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."Id"

SELECT t."Id", t."ActionType", t."Code", t."CreatedDate", t."Definition", t."HttpType", t."MenuId", t."UpdatedDate", t."Id0", t0."EndpointsId", t0."RolesId", t0."Id", t0."ConcurrencyStamp", t0."Name", t0."NormalizedName", t."CreatedDate0", t."Name", t."UpdatedDate0"
FROM (
    SELECT e."Id", e."ActionType", e."Code", e."CreatedDate", e."Definition", e."HttpType", e."MenuId", e."UpdatedDate", m."Id" AS "Id0", m."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", m."Name", m."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "Endpoints" AS e
    INNER JOIN "Menus" AS m ON e."MenuId" = m."Id"
    WHERE (e."Code" = @__code_0) AND (m."Name" = @__menu_1)
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT a."EndpointsId", a."RolesId", a0."Id", a0."ConcurrencyStamp", a0."Name", a0."NormalizedName"
    FROM "AppRoleEndpoint" AS a
    INNER JOIN "AspNetRoles" AS a0 ON a."RolesId" = a0."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."EndpointsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t."Id0", t0."EndpointsId", t0."RolesId"

SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."OrderCode", (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName", CASE
    WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
END AS "Completed"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON t."Id" = c."OrderId"
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

) AS t

    SELECT e."Id", e."ActionType", e."Code", e."CreatedDate", e."Definition", e."HttpType", e."MenuId", e."UpdatedDate", m."Id" AS "Id0", m."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", m."Name", m."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "Endpoints" AS e
    INNER JOIN "Menus" AS m ON e."MenuId" = m."Id"
    WHERE (e."Code" = @__code_0) AND (m."Name" = @__menu_1)
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT a."EndpointsId", a."RolesId", a0."Id", a0."ConcurrencyStamp", a0."Name", a0."NormalizedName"
    FROM "AppRoleEndpoint" AS a
    INNER JOIN "AspNetRoles" AS a0 ON a."RolesId" = a0."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."EndpointsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t."Id0", t0."EndpointsId", t0."RolesId"

    SELECT e."Id", e."ActionType", e."Code", e."CreatedDate", e."Definition", e."HttpType", e."MenuId", e."UpdatedDate", m."Id" AS "Id0", m."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", m."Name", m."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "Endpoints" AS e
    INNER JOIN "Menus" AS m ON e."MenuId" = m."Id"
    WHERE (e."Code" = @__code_0) AND (m."Name" = @__menu_1)
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT a."EndpointsId", a."RolesId", a0."Id", a0."ConcurrencyStamp", a0."Name", a0."NormalizedName"
    FROM "AppRoleEndpoint" AS a
    INNER JOIN "AspNetRoles" AS a0 ON a."RolesId" = a0."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."EndpointsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t."Id0", t0."EndpointsId", t0."RolesId"

2023-08-20 09:32:30.374 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 09:32:35.545 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 09:32:47.651 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_0 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"

) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 09:33:04.961 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 09:33:47.334 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."OrderCode", (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName", CASE
    WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
END AS "Completed"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON t."Id" = c."OrderId"
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 09:34:09.130 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 11:13:18.377 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (15ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."OrderCode", (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName", CASE
    WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
END AS "Completed"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON t."Id" = c."OrderId"
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

    SELECT b."Id", b."CreatedDate", b."UpdatedDate", b."UserId"
    FROM "Baskets" AS b

    LIMIT 1
) AS t

    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."BasketId"

2023-08-20 11:14:20.107 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 11:15:51.322 +04:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2023-08-20 11:15:51.327 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 11:15:51.333 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 11:26:40.826 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 11:26:59.231 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (5ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 13:10:23.723 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (77ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."OrderCode", (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName", CASE
    WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
END AS "Completed"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON t."Id" = c."OrderId"
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

    INNER JOIN "Menus" AS m ON e."MenuId" = m."Id"

) AS t

2023-08-20 13:10:55.136 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (13ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 13:11:19.465 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 13:11:19.475 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT

2023-08-20 13:13:26.200 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 13:15:56.786 +04:00 [INF] Entity Framework Core 6.0.2 initialized 'ETicaretAPIDbContext' using provider 'Npgsql.EntityFrameworkCore.PostgreSQL:6.0.3+94d0a8eaeb9cf5af6ce55a9e59153c1a1be3244f' with options: None
2023-08-20 13:15:56.813 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (12ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."Name", t."Price", t."Stock", t."UpdatedDate", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."CreatedDate", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    WHERE p."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId", t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 13:17:26.569 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 13:39:41.519 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (4ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName", CASE
    WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
END AS "Completed"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON t."Id" = c."OrderId"
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 13:43:13.931 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (6ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."OrderCode", (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName", CASE
    WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
END AS "Completed"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON t."Id" = c."OrderId"
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode", b."Id" AS "Id0", b."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", b."UpdatedDate", b."UserId", CASE
        WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
        ELSE FALSE
    END AS c, o."Address", o."Description", c."Id" AS "Id1"

    INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON o."Id" = b."Id"
    WHERE o."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"

) AS t0 ON t."Id0" = t0."BasketId"

2023-08-20 13:44:11.690 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__Parse_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."OrderCode", t."Id0", t."CreatedDate0", t."UpdatedDate", t."UserId", t."Id1", t0."Id", t0."BasketId", t0."CreatedDate", t0."ProductId", t0."Quantity", t0."UpdatedDate", t0."Id0", t0."CreatedDate0", t0."Name", t0."Price", t0."Stock", t0."UpdatedDate0", t.c, t."Address", t."Description"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode", b."Id" AS "Id0", b."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", b."UpdatedDate", b."UserId", CASE
        WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
        ELSE FALSE
    END AS c, o."Address", o."Description", c."Id" AS "Id1"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON o."Id" = c."OrderId"
    INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON o."Id" = b."Id"
    WHERE o."Id" = @__Parse_0
    LIMIT 1
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT b0."Id", b0."BasketId", b0."CreatedDate", b0."ProductId", b0."Quantity", b0."UpdatedDate", p."Id" AS "Id0", p."CreatedDate" AS "CreatedDate0", p."Name", p."Price", p."Stock", p."UpdatedDate" AS "UpdatedDate0"
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id0" = t0."BasketId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t."Id1", t."Id0", t0."Id"

2023-08-20 13:47:21.452 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (7ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."CreatedDate", t."OrderCode", (
    SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p."Price" * b0."Quantity"::real), 0)
    FROM "BasketItems" AS b0
    INNER JOIN "Products" AS p ON b0."ProductId" = p."Id"
    WHERE b."Id" = b0."BasketId") AS "TotalPrice", a."UserName", CASE
    WHEN (c."Id" IS NOT NULL) THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
END AS "Completed"
FROM (
    SELECT o."Id", o."CreatedDate", o."OrderCode"
    FROM "Orders" AS o
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN "CompletedOrders" AS c ON t."Id" = c."OrderId"
INNER JOIN "Baskets" AS b ON t."Id" = b."Id"
INNER JOIN "AspNetUsers" AS a ON b."UserId" = a."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 13:49:25.168 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 13:49:25.175 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"

2023-08-20 13:49:52.885 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (1ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT COUNT(*)::INT
FROM "Products" AS p
2023-08-20 13:49:52.890 +04:00 [INF] Executed DbCommand (2ms) [Parameters=[@__p_1='?' (DbType = Int32), @__p_0='?' (DbType = Int32)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT t."Id", t."Name", t."Stock", t."Price", t."CreatedDate", t."UpdatedDate", t0."Id", t0."CreatedDate", t0."Discriminator", t0."FileName", t0."Path", t0."Storage", t0."Showcase", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Name", p."Stock", p."Price", p."CreatedDate", p."UpdatedDate"
    FROM "Products" AS p
    LIMIT @__p_1 OFFSET @__p_0
) AS t
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT t1."Id", t1."CreatedDate", t1."Discriminator", t1."FileName", t1."Path", t1."Storage", t1."Showcase", p0."ProductImageFilesId", p0."ProductsId"
    FROM "ProductProductImageFile" AS p0
    INNER JOIN (
        SELECT f."Id", f."CreatedDate", f."Discriminator", f."FileName", f."Path", f."Storage", f."Showcase"
        FROM "Files" AS f
        WHERE f."Discriminator" = 'ProductImageFile'
    ) AS t1 ON p0."ProductImageFilesId" = t1."Id"
) AS t0 ON t."Id" = t0."ProductsId"
ORDER BY t."Id", t0."ProductImageFilesId", t0."ProductsId"
